search.query: `index_and_sourcetype` $user$ $src$ $dest$ $http_user_agent$ $action$ | fields user src dest http_user_agent action status status_category category bytes_in bytes_out bytes_to_client block_id block_reason url_domain rule web_reputation web_reputation_risk url contains_exe contains_macro file_hash file_name malware malware_probability url_protocol app | stats sparkline count AS Total_Requests , sum(eval(action="blocked")) AS Blocked_Requests, sum(eval(action="auth")) AS Auth_Requests, sum(eval(action="error")) AS Errors, sum(bytes_in) AS bytes_in, sum(bytes_to_client) AS bytes_to_client, dc(user) AS #user, dc(src) AS #src, dc(dest) AS #dest by http_user_agent | sort -Total_Requests | eval bytes_in_MB=`format_bytes(bytes_in)` | eval bytes_to_client_MB=`format_bytes(bytes_to_client)`
